cells.data:
For the visible part, give the tag class=“bcls-question”

For the hidden part, use the tag class=“bcls-answer”

Example:

<p class="bcls-question">How do I do that?</p>
<p class="bcls-answer">Here’s how....</p>

include this script: http://docs.brightcove.com/en/scripts/bclsfaq.js
<script src="http://docs.brightcove.com/en/scripts/bclsfaq.js"></script>
